data.text: We've spotted more intruders. Send backup.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: They have a sniper. Get him first!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: They're up there too!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Come on! What the hell are the others doing!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: They're headed this way!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Where's our damn backup!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Focus on the other one! Quickly, before we're surrounded!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Who're you!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Focus! Stay with your team!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Take 'em all down!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What is this shit!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Dammit! There's just too many of them!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Why you─! Who the hell are you!?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: You're gonna pay!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Nice job! Give 'em hell!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: That was over super quick!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Puttin' up a fight, huh?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Don't let them escape!
data.speaker: Elite Shock Trooper

data.text: Tasty treats! Come and get 'em!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Don't eat me! Please don't eat me!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Midgar Special, don't fail me now!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: I'm not tired! I can do this all night!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: How much...more time...do you think...you'll need...?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Cloud! Try and lead them toward the mines!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: All set and ready to go! Bring 'em in Cloud!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: My mines will do real damage!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Cloud, our best bet is to lead them toward the mines!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: I laid a few more mines for ya!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Hurry! Lead the sweepers toward the mines!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Cloud, it's over there!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: There still some left, you know! You should make use of them while you can!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: At last, our long-awaited dance begins! Here's to a fair fight, my friend!

Tough break. They changed the times.
Last train's already left.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Which is why we borrowed these bikes. Need a lift to the plate?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: How did you guess...?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Easy. You've been acting weird.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Like, talking about one thing when you're obviously thinking about something else.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Yeah, and don't get me started on all that pep.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: All right, I'll give you that─but how did you know I wanted to head topside?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Was I talking in my sleep? What else did I say!?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: No. We just figured you wanted to see your parents. That's all.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Nailed it, huh?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Yup. Right on the head.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So─seeing as we don't have any family of our own...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: How about you let us be a part of yours for a bit? You know, spread the wealth.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Are your parents still around?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: No.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Okay, then. Guess you're all invited!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Here's to awkward family reunions!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Yeah!
data.speaker: Biggs & Wedge

data.text: Yeah!
data.speaker: Biggs & Wedge

data.text: I take it you boys have your brand-spanking-new IDs?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Yes, ma'am!
data.speaker: Biggs & Wedge

data.text: Then let's lay down some rubber!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Crank that throttle!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Okay, you got it!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: You hear me?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Yeah.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Just so you know, I'm not going plateside for the reason they think I am.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Look─you saw the way the reactor went up. It was huge, right?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Because of all the mako. Isn't that what you said?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Yeah...that was wishful thinking.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Deep down, I know it was my fault.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I used a more powerful blasting agent than the directions called for.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: It had nothing to do with the mako.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Let's say you're right. So what?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: But...since I can't get in touch with my supplier, our only option is to loot a warehouse owned by Shinra.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Shinra?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Good luck with that.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: With your help, we won't need luck.

data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Ready!?

data.text: We made it!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Woo-hoo! Topside!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Who's that?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: A SOLDIER.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Had enough?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't be absurd.
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: As if I could ever grow tired of your company!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Naughty, naughty!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Until one of our flames is forever extinguished, our dance will never end!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Burn for me!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Come on! Let's push it past the redline!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Jessie, take over.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text:
Well, well, well!
I do believe this round is yours.
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Maybe next time we can keep it just between the two of us.
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: Maybe.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Until we meet again, my friend!
data.speaker: Roche

data.text: We did it!

data.speaker: Wedge

data.text:
Don't get too excited.
Reinforcements are hot on our trail.

data.text: You passed the test!

data.text: What test?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Driving.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Been driving for years.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: So you don't need a reward?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: No.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well, you got one anyway.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You can thank me later. I'll wait.

data.text: Giving me the cold shoulder?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Aw, would you look at that... It's the end of the ride.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You passed the test!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: What test?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Driving.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Did more than just pass.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Not really. You made it by the skin of your teeth, if we're being honest.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Whatever.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I bet you held back because I was with you.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Didn't want you to fall.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: So now I'm too weak to stay on a bike?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just hold on tight, will you?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I might...be falling after all.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Psych!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Aw, would you look at that... It's the end of the ride.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You failed the test.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: What test?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Driving.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I'm great at driving.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hah! Great at scaring your passengers more like...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Not used to having any.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Maybe you should just let me drive.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Nope.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Guess I'll take one for the team and be your back warmer again.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Aw, would you look at that... It's the end of the ride.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: We'll go on foot from here.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Don't wanna draw too much attention to ourselves.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Hey, did these things leave a mark?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: They got you pretty good.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Aw...and I'm running on fumes...
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Don't worry, we'll top you up soon enough.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Now let's roll.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Here we are─the employee housing district. Where they put you when your parents work for Shinra.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: While their reactors were slowly killing the planet, we were living the good life...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: With your help, we won't need luck.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You'll take on just about any job, right?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Well, I need you to rob my house. Think you can do that for me?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Go in through the back door when the coast is clear. The signal will be obvious.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Once the lights come on, it's go time.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Time to go.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Inside, you'll find a room with two doors.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Don't take the one in front of you. You want the room on the right. That's where you'll find it.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: We'll be chatting Mom up in the kitchen, so don't even bother being quiet.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Dad'll be in there, but it's okay.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: There's no way she'll ever hear you.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I need you to grab his Shinra ID card. And yeah, I know I should do it myself, but...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: but I honestly don't think I'm up to it.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just do this for me, okay?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: When are you going to give up on the Gold Saucer? How long has it been since you even performed?
data.speaker: Jessie's Mom

data.text: A lot of people really rely on Jessie.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: As a stagehand though, right? You can be one of those anywhere.
data.speaker: Jessie's Mom

data.text: So why not come home and get a job at the Sector 8 theater?
data.speaker: Jessie's Mom

data.text: Uhhh, I'll think about it.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You know, I'd really love to stay and chat, but we gotta go.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So soon!?
data.speaker: Jessie's Mom

data.text: Yeah, well, we hadn't even planned on dropping by.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: But Wedge wanted some of your famous pizza.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So good!

data.text: Sure I can't tempt you with some more?

data.text: Maybe just a couple slices, Missus R.

data.text: Wedge!
data.speaker: Biggs & Jessie

data.text: Hey! I'm...I'm doing it for you guys!

data.text: You don't want me going to work on an empty stomach.

data.text: I'm planning on using a weaker blasting agent this time.

data.text: Now comes the hard part.

data.text: All right, let's get to it.

data.text: Sorry, but you're staying outside.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Only I know what to steal from where, so it's gotta be me who goes in.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So...we came all this way just to eat pizza!?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: You think I'd let you off that easy?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You're gonna earn every slice helping Cloud.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Just do the thing where you draw everyone's attention away, like you did at my parents'.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: What's the word again? Maybe I'm more nervous than I thought.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Diversion.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Yeah, that! Nice one, military man.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: So what, does this mean we're gonna ask some Shinra folks out to dinner?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: You know damn well what she means.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: While you're inside, we make sure the guards are focused on the outside. Yeah?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Exactly. Couldn't've put it any better.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: When you see a flare go up, that's your cue. Rush the front gates and make for the warehouse plaza.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: The more hell you raise, the more time you buy me.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: You're gonna run this guy into the ground, aren'tcha?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: How much time do you think you'll need?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Not too much. I'll be in and out.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: I'll send up another flare when I'm done. We rendezvous in the vacant lot up ahead.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Hold on. How are we supposed to get back to the slums? Wait for the first train?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: No, I wanna be back before that.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Don't worry, I have something worked out.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Now, let's get this done.

data.text: Well, that diversion's not gonna create itself.

data.text: Just need to get past this gate.

data.text: Wait.

data.text: Looks like someone beat us here.

data.text: And I don't think it was Jessie.

data.text: This had better not get in the way of our plans...

data.text: It won't.

data.text: You start things off by cutting loose where everyone can see you.

data.text: And us?

data.text: We're the backup.

data.text: Heya.

data.text: So...what did you wanna talk about?

data.text: Ah... Um...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: When spring comes, I'm leaving town and going to Midgar.

data.text: Should've figured. All the guys are leaving.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: B-but I'm not like them. I'm not going just to look for work.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm gonna be a SOLDIER.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: The best of the best. Like Sephiroth.

data.text: The great war hero, huh?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Mm... Isn't it pretty hard to become a SOLDIER?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Yeah. So I won't be back for a long time.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Guess not. Think you'll be in the papers?
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I'll try.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Just...promise me one thing.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: When we're older, and you're a famous SOLDIER...if I'm ever trapped or in trouble...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Promise you'll come and save me.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Huh?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That's what heroes do. They save people.

data.text: Please? Just once.
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Uhh...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Come on, promise me!
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: Fine. I promise.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I heard you're having second thoughts.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I know we have to think big if we're going to make a difference...but not like this.

data.text: I just...
data.speaker: Tifa

data.text: I feel trapped.

data.text: Catch me if you caaan!

data.text: Think I ran off the pizza...

data.text: I'm glad someone's enjoying themselves...

data.text: You ready?

data.text: Hell yeah!

data.text: But you won't be if they start asking questions.

data.text: Wedge'll be fine.

data.text: First guests to the party. Another Avalanche cell.

data.text: Our holier-than-thou friends from the old guard...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: It's always their way or the highway. Lately they've been a real pain in the ass...

data.text: Till now.

data.text: So then why are they here?

data.text: Word is they've cut a deal with Wutai...

data.text: Think there's any truth to that?

data.text: though they're the ones running around with mil-spec gear.

data.text: Really? Let me see...

data.text: Are we seriously doing this here?

data.text: That's...wow.

data.text: You guys are the worst...

data.text: Your ass is fine.

data.text: This is like a bruise or a mild burn at worst!

data.text: Is that a smile I spy?

data.text: It's not safe here. We should go.

data.text: Should be somewhere around here...

data.text: Bingo!

data.text: Parachutes?

data.text: Huh? Whaddya mean "half figured"!?

data.text: Fifty-fifty is pretty good odds, if you ask me!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: This is gonna be fun!

data.text: W-wait!

data.text: Thanks guys. I really appreciate you coming all this way with me.

data.text: And like I said before, I'd be grateful if you kept this between us until after the mission.

data.text: I don't wanna...complicate things.

data.text: Sure.

data.text: Okay, who's ready to fly!?

data.text: Yep.

data.text: S-stop it! What in the hell are you trying to─

data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Hey. Didn't I tell you to let me know when you were ready?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: So, are we not gonna wait for Wedge?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: If we stuck around or went back, he'd only get upset.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Why's that?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Guess a SOLDIER wouldn't understand...
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: I'll tell him you were worried about him, though. Who knows─might just make his day.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: No way we're getting past all them. Need to find a way around.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: ...And many of our citizens have already been disturbed by the alarms.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Squad A will set up here and search for suspects.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: B will establish a perimeter─roadblocks included. Contain the situation!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Rumors of violence against Public Security will only serve to frighten the people.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: You will tell any concerned citizens that this was a false alarm!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Looking a lot more crowded now.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Security's out in force.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Just what we need.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: What, hungry for more? I know how you feel, but another time.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: We're trying not to get caught!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Man, can't believe HQ was running an op tonight of all nights.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Coincidence?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: That or a bad omen. If they're ramping up for something, could get messy.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Add it to the pile of complications to think about.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: So, how do we get back to the slums?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: With a little trick I've been dying to try out...
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Right, this is it! Through here and we're home free.
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Where exactly are we going?
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: When we get there, you'll know!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Uhh, Cloud? Try not to fall behind!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Hey Cloud! We're going this way!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: You're gonna get lost!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Now that I've got my blasting agent, we should have everything we need for our next mission!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Sure hope so.
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Yeah...me too. For your dad's sake.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey! What the hell, man!?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Huh?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Uh─Cloud was just saying how he hopes to come back and try the Midgar Special next time!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Really, huh? Cloud said that?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Sure did! Wants a whole pie to himself, isn't that right?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: That's...that's right...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Really...?
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: Well, okay then! Maybe I'll lend Mom a hand next time too!
data.speaker: Jessie

data.text: That'd be awesome!
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: Super-duper awesome!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: We're supposed to regroup at the lot!
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Hey! You trying to get caught or what?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Seriously, where you trying to go!?
data.speaker: Biggs

data.text: Hey! It's the lot Jessie was talking about.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: We rendezvous here when we've got what we came for.
data.speaker: Wedge

data.text: All residents are to return to their homes and remain indoors until further notice.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: I repeat─for your safety, go home!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: I heard someone say it was an attack.
Hey─it was those terrorists, right!?
There has been no attack. For your safety, please go home and remain indoors until further notice.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: It was a false alarm─there was no attack. Please return to your homes at once.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Hey! What are you, an idiot!? Move your vehicle! I got places to be!
An emergency has been declared. All civilians are to remain indoors. Your cooperation is appreciated.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: An emergency has been declared. All civilians, please remain indoors.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What are you people doing out here in the middle of the night? My kids are trying to sleep!
I apologize, ma'am.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Please remain indoors until we inform you that it is safe to leave.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Damn it. I gotta be up at the ass-crack of dawn, you know!
We ask that you remain indoors for your safety as well as that of others.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Ma'am, please, calm down! I need you to go back inside and stay there. An emergency's been declared!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: It's Wutai, isn't it! Lemme get my gun─I'll teach 'em to mess with Midgar!
Don't you worry about me─I killed myself a platoon's worth of them bastards back in the war!
Y-yes, thank you for your service! Now if you would just allow me to escort you back home...
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Please, listen to me! If you would all just calm down...
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: C'mon, man, let me through!
Access to this area is restricted! Return to your homes at once!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: I just need a moment to get in there and grab my kid!
Sorry, no exceptions whatsoever!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: What!?
Access to this area is restricted!
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Any updates from the squad sent to the plaza?
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: No. Seems like no one knows anything.
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Not gonna get any sleep tonight...
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: I've got some friends in that squad...
data.speaker: Security Officer

data.text: Hey! Get down from there, right now! You'll give your father a heart attack!
Can't see anything from here...
It's true! It was like a giant fireworks show! Boom!
Someone was definitely fighting in there!
The Shinra officers all said it was just an equipment malfunction.
That's enough. Let's all go back to bed now.
Dad!
